com.pizza.CMController

Class PreisController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMController.PreisController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PreisController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Controls the PreisEintrag Model

    The PreisController class implements the controller of the PreisEintrag model. It contains some methods used to fetch the entries of the Preis table from the database as well as other values
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPreisId

        public java.lang.Integer getPreisId(java.lang.Integer speiseId)
        This method gets the preisId from the Preis table for a certain Speise i.e. with a specific speiseId. In this case this speise has no specified grosse.
        Parameters:
        speiseId - This is the ID of the speise whose preisId we are looking for
        Returns:
        Integer This is the preisId of the Speise with SpeiseId = speiseId

      • getPreisId

        public java.lang.Integer getPreisId(java.lang.Integer speiseId,
                           java.lang.Integer grosseId)
        This method gets the preisId from the Preis table for a certain Speise i.e. with a specific speiseId and grosseId.
        Parameters:
        speiseId - This is the ID of the speise whose preisId we are looking for
        grosseId - This is the ID of the grosse whose preisId we are looking for
        Returns:
        Integer This is the preisId of the Speise with SpeiseId = speiseId and grosseId = grosseId
